t:
I feel a pang of regret and sorrow
for all the times that I missed the chance
to show you how much I love you with my
glance.                                                       



                                                         cont...
c:
You sleep so peacefully on the sofa there,
and I long to join you in your slumber,
to feel your heartbeat in my ear,
the most soothing sound that I remember.

I should have written a poem for every occasion
to mark the milestones of our journey.
But I didn’t, so I’m writing now
to capture the moments that are worthy.
This is the sky I want to live under,
the one that shines with your smile.

I have an urge, an itch to wander,
to all the people who know your style.
To ask them about your stories and quirks,
the things that make you unique and fun.
To learn from them what you forgot or lost,
to know you better than anyone.

I don’t want to sleep to your gentle tune.
I wish for you to open your eyes and gaze,
to whisper my name gently and clearly
again and again like a sunny haze.



Good evening. Time to collab and complete this #lovepoem. #apoemforyou #YourQuoteAndMine #regret #longing #romance #nostalgia #confession
